UPDATE CAFE
NAME = #{name}, PHONE_NUMBER= #{phoneNumber}, ROAD_ADDRESS = #{roadAddress}, DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{detailAddress}, SI_GUN_GU_ID = #{siGunGuId}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath}, BUSINESS_NUMBER = #{businessNumber},
mapper.select: SELECT caf.ID "id", EMAIL "email", caf.NAME "name", PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", DESCRIPTION "description", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "reviewCount" FROM CAFE caf LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = caf.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.id) "reviewCount" FROM RESERVATION res JOIN review rv ON res.id = rv.reservation_id GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) c ON c.CAFE_ID = caf.ID Where caf.ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT caf.ID "id", EMAIL "email", caf.NAME "name", PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", DESCRIPTION "description", BUSINESS_NUMBER "businessNumber", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", MEMBER_ID "memberId" FROM CAFE caf LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = caf.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID Where MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT caf.ID "id", caf.NAME "cafeName", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice", "reviewCount", "resCount" FROM CAFE caf LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, MIN(PRICE) "minPrice" FROM ROOM roo JOIN CAFE ON CAFE_ID = CAFE.ID GROUP BY CAFE_ID) b ON b.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = caf.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.id) "reviewCount" FROM RESERVATION res JOIN review rv ON res.id = rv.reservation_id GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) c ON c.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.ID) "resCount" FROM RESERVATION res WHERE res.STATUS = 'use' OR res.STATUS = 'complete' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) d ON d.CAFE_ID = caf.ID WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT "id", "cafeName", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "latitude", "longitude", "startTime", "endTime", "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice", "reviewCount", "resCount" FROM (SELECT caf.ID "id", caf.NAME "cafeName", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice", "reviewCount", "resCount" FROM CAFE caf LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, MIN(PRICE) "minPrice" FROM ROOM roo JOIN CAFE ON CAFE_ID = CAFE.ID GROUP BY CAFE_ID) b ON b.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = caf.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.id) "reviewCount" FROM RESERVATION res JOIN review rv ON res.id = rv.reservation_id GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) c ON c.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, COUNT(res.ID) "resCount" FROM RESERVATION res WHERE res.STATUS = 'use' OR res.STATUS = 'complete' GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) d ON d.CAFE_ID = caf.ID WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY "resCount" ASC, "cafeRating" ASC, REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT caf.ID "id", caf.NAME "cafeName", do.NAME "siDoName", si.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", LATITUDE "latitude", LONGITUDE "longitude", START_TIME "startTime", END_TIME "endTime", IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", "cafeRating", "minPrice" FROM CAFE caf LEFT JOIN (SELECT res.CAFE_ID, AVG(rev.RATING) "cafeRating" FROM REVIEW rev JOIN RESERVATION res ON rev.RESERVATION_ID = res.ID GROUP BY res.CAFE_ID) a ON a.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, MIN(PRICE) "minPrice" FROM ROOM roo JOIN CAFE ON CAFE_ID = CAFE.ID GROUP BY CAFE_ID) b ON b.CAFE_ID = caf.ID LEFT JOIN SI_GUN_GU si ON si.ID = caf.SI_GUN_GU_ID LEFT JOIN SI_DO do ON do.ID = si.SI_DO_ID

SELECT COUNT(ID) "count" FROM CAFE WHERE STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT "id", "email", "cafeName", "phoneNumber", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "description", "imagePath", "regdate", "businessNumber", "memberName" FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM / #{elementSize}) "request_page", "id", "email", "cafeName", "phoneNumber", "siDoName", "siGunGuName", "roadAddress", "detailAddress", "description", "imagePath", "regdate", "businessNumber", "memberName" FROM (SELECT c.ID "id", c.EMAIL "email", c.NAME "cafeName", c.PHONE_NUMBER "phoneNumber", sd.NAME "siDoName", sgg.NAME "siGunGuName", ROAD_ADDRESS "roadAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress", DESCRIPTION "description", c.IMAGE_PATH "imagePath", TO_CHAR(c.REGDATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') "regdate", BUSINESS_NUMBER "businessNumber", m.NAME "memberName" FROM CAFE c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_ID = m.ID JOIN SI_GUN_GU sgg ON c.SI_GUN_GU_ID = sgg.ID JOIN SI_DO sd ON sgg.SI_DO_ID = sd.ID WHERE c.STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY c.regdate DESC ORDER BY c.regdate ASC)) WHERE "request_page" = #{requestPage}

SELECT "month", COUNT(regdate) "cafeCount" FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -ROWNUM + 1), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') "month" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) LEFT JOIN CAFE ON TO_CHAR(TRUNC(regdate, 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') = "month" AND CAFE.STATUS = 'enabled' GROUP BY "month" ORDER BY "month"
